allow: Bash(for f in src/styles/chevron.css src/styles/aspect-ratio-fit.css src/styles/json-pretty.css src/styles/daterange.css src/styles/switch.css src/styles/collapsible-panel.css src/styles/progress-bar.css src/styles/popover.css src/styles/carousel.css src/styles/scroll.css src/styles/slider.css src/styles/number-spinner.css src/styles/datepicker.css src/styles/image-uploader.css src/styles/checkbox.css src/styles/skeleton.css src/styles/side-menu.css src/styles/side-menu-items.css src/styles/tooltip.css src/styles/snackbar.css src/styles/menu.css src/styles/data-table.css src/styles/table.css src/styles/select.css src/styles/button.css src/styles/form.css src/styles/pagination.css src/styles/modal.css)

Bash(do python -c "
import sys
path = sys.argv[1]
with open\(path, ''r'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as fh:
    content = fh.read\(\)
# Skip if already wrapped
if content.strip\(\).startswith\(''@layer components''\):
    print\(f''SKIP {path}''\)
    sys.exit\(0\)
# Indent all lines
lines = content.split\(''\\n''\)
indented = []
for line in lines:
    if line.strip\(\) == '''':
        indented.append\(''''\)
    else:
        indented.append\(''    '' + line\)
new_content = ''@layer components {\\n'' + ''\\n''.join\(indented\) + ''\\n}\\n''
with open\(path, ''w'', encoding=''utf-8''\) as fh:
    fh.write\(new_content\)
print\(f''DONE {path}''\)
" "$f")
